benchmark_details.name: SYNTH BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: SYNTH BENCH encompasses 8 domain-specific documents across 4 domains, featuring diverse query complexities, clue completeness, and fine-grained citation granularity. It serves to evaluate retrievers on queries of different complexities and generators on fidelity to retrieved documents.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To optimize retriever robustness and generator fidelity through the use of synthetic data in the RAG framework.

data.annotation: Manually curated and validated through specific evaluation criteria.

methodology.calculation: CSG is calculated based on completeness, understanding, and citation scores.
methodology.interpretation: A higher CSG indicates better fidelity and robustness of the generated answers.
methodology.validation: Evaluated on queries of different complexities.
